bibl.title: Did BGU XIV 2367 Work?
Identifiers and Identification Methods in the Ancient World = Legal Documents in Ancient Societies. III

bibl.note: An earlier version of this paper was presented at a seminar of the Department of Classics, at the University of Berkeley, California in April 2008.
bibl.seg: Uri Yiftach-Firanko, Did BGU XIV 2367 Work?

Mark Depauw & Sandra Coussement (edd.), Identifiers and Identification Methods in the Ancient World = Legal Documents in Ancient Societies. III = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 229 (Leuven - Paris - Walpole, MA, 2014) pp. 103-118.
